content: chain 2 4 turn the work half_double_crochet 1 in the 2nd chain from hook then half_double_crochet 3 along the fin in the middle loops only single_crochet 1 flo in the next stitch in the round stitch 20 1 2 3 4 4 now complete the round in the remaining 3 stitches single_crochet 2 increase 24 stitches in round round 9 single_crochet 1 increase single_crochet 7 increase single_crochet 4 increase single_crochet 7 increase single_crochet 1 28 round 10 single_crochet around make a shift stitch 28 round 11 single_crochet 13 you ll now build the first part of the dorsal fin 1 single_crochet 1 flo in the next stitch stitch 14 of round chain up 5 2 half_double_crochet 4 down the chain single_crochet 1 in the front loop you started in stitch 14 trust the pattern here- this will look wrong at this point as the fin will be flat don t worry the next few rounds will fix this and produce an upright fin 1 2 now continue the round single_crochet 11 you ll now build the first pelvic fin this is exactly the same as the second pectoral fin that you made in round 8 page 4 refer to the photos if you need to 1 single_crochet 1 flo in the next stitch stitch 26 of round chain up 4 2 half_double_crochet 3 down the chain slip_stitch 1 in the same front loop stitch 26 chain 1 3 turn the work half_double_crochet 3 along the fin in the middle loops only chain 2 4 turn the work half_double_crochet 1 in the 2nd chain from hook then half_double_crochet 3 along the fin in the middle loops only single_crochet 1 flo in the next stitch in the round stitch 27 now complete the round sc1 in the remaining stitch round 12 single_crochet 1 you ll now build the second pelvic fin this is exactly the same as the first pectoral fin that you made in round 8 page 4 refer to the photos if you need to 1 single_crochet 1 flo in the next stitch stitch 2 of round chain up 5 2 half_double_crochet 4 down the chain slip_stitch 1 in the front loop you started in stitch 2 chain 1 3 turn the work half_double_crochet 3 along the fin in the middle loops only chain 1 4 turn the work half_double_crochet 3 along the fin in the middle loops only single_crochet 1 flo in the next stitch in the round stitch 3 now complete the round single_crochet 25 28 stitches in round pelvic fins should look like this 5 round 13 single_crochet 13 you ll now build the second part of the dorsal fin 1 single_crochet 1 flo in the next stitch stitch 14 of round slightly twist the dorsal fin clockwise so that the row of hdcs is facing upwards 2 half_double_crochet 3 up the fin in the middle loops only chain 1 3 turn the work half_double_crochet 3 down the fin in the middle loops only 4 single_crochet 1
